summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing for Upstate Hot Tubs website refactoring. All 13 requested features tested successfully. Navigation dropdowns (Shop/Discover), Wellness page, Product detail pages with color swatches, view toggle buttons, and Contact page with Google Map all working correctly.

integration_issues.issue: Popup appears on every page scroll but can be closed. This is expected behavior for promotional popup.
Console shows 429 (rate limit) error for some image requests from smushcdn.com domain, but images display correctly

passed_tests: Navigation: Shop dropdown shows Hot Tubs, Swim Spas, Saunas, Cold Plunges
Navigation: Discover dropdown shows About Us, Events, Financing, Spa Butler Service
Navigation: Wellness link works and navigates correctly
Homepage: Hero section with video background loads
Homepage: Product sections (Hot Tubs, Swim Spas) load correctly
Product detail: Clicking hot tub from /hot-tubs loads detail page
Product detail: Shell color swatches (white, silver, opal) are clickable
Product detail: Cabinet color swatches (coastalGray, walnut, barnwood, black) are clickable
Product detail: Side view and overhead view buttons work and toggle images
Product detail: Product specs displayed (Seats: 6 Adults, Jets: 61, Electrical: 240v/60amp, Dimensions: 92" x 92" x 37.5")
Wellness page: Hero section with 'Live Your Best Life' text loads
Wellness page: Benefits content (hydrotherapy, sleep) visible
Contact page: Contact form with all fields (name, email, phone, interest, message)
Contact page: Google Map iframe loads correctly
Footer: Displays correctly with navigation links and contact info
critical_code_review_comments: All data-testid attributes are properly implemented for key interactive elements
Color selector component well-structured with proper state management
Product detail page has good fallback image handling with onError
Navigation dropdowns use proper hover state with AnimatePresence for smooth animations
seed_data_creation: N/A - Frontend only site with static product data
context_for_next_testing_agent: All requested features are working. Navigation dropdowns (Shop with 4 product categories, Discover with 4 links), Wellness page with hero and benefits sections, Product detail pages with color swatches and view toggles, Contact page with form and Google Map - all verified functional. Tax special popup appears but is dismissible. Some image 429 errors from CDN but images load correctly.
